about_the_game:
Description

Enter the world of Maze Domination, a fast-paced, level-based game where strategy and speed are key. As a player, you'll control specialized robots—each with unique abilities—designed to navigate the intricate mazes.

Gameplay Overview

In Maze Domination, your mission is to collect valuable figurines scattered across various biomes, from scorching deserts to frozen tundras, dense forests, and even abstract dimensions. The maze walls are constructed from cubic structures.

Features:

- Level-based gameplay
- Speedrunning
- Multiple roller bots each with their own skills
- Diverse Biomes
- Collectibles
- Unique 3D mazes
- Leaderboards
- Skins
- Enemies

name: Maze Domination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), macOS 10.15+, or Linux (most recent versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), macOS 11+, or Linux (most recent versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space MB available space

short_description: Maze Domination is a fast-paced maze game where strategy and speed are key. Control unique robots through intricate mazes, collecting figurines across diverse biomes. Manage energy, avoid or kill enemies, and compete on leaderboards in this dynamic, level-based adventure.
